DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study measure energy intake energy expenditure pregnancy . The investigator hypothesize obese pregnant woman weight gain IOM guideline , 'High Gainers ' , increase energy intake evidence change energy expenditure adjustment weight gain compare woman appropriate gestational weight gain , 'Normal Gainers ' . Additionally , investigator measure baby bear pregnant woman enrol MomEE one time point 10 day life .
DOC.brief_title: Determinants Gestational Weight Gain Obese Pregnant Women
DOC.criteria: Are pregnant Have BMI great equal 30kg/m2 Are 1840 year old Medically clear participation primary care obstetrician Medically clear participant Medical Investigator Willingness allow study access information participant 's medical record Willingness notify incidental finding study procedure Clinical Hypertension ( i.e . SBP > 160 mmHg & DBP > 110 mmHg ) * Diagnosis diabetes prior pregnancy Hb A1c ≥6.5 % * Implanted metal object render MRI unsafe HIV AIDS ( selfreported ) Severe anemia ( hemoglobin < 8g/dL and/or hematocrit < 24 % ) ** Psychological History current psychotic disorder diagnosis current major depressive episode bipolar disorder Past history anorexia bulimia medical history patient report ( binge eat disorder exclusion ) current eat disorder Actively suicidal define value ≥2 BDIII question 9* Medications Current use one follow medication : metformin , systemic steroid , antipsychotic agent ( e.g. , Abilify , Haldol , Risperdal , Seroquel , Zyprexa ) , antiseizure medication mood stabilizer would expect significant impact body weight ( e.g. , Depakote , Lamictal , Lithium , Neurontin , Tegretol , Topamax , Keppra ) , medication ADHD include amphetamine methylphenidate Continued use weight loss medication include OTC dietary supplement weight loss ( e.g. , Adipex , Suprenza , Tenuate , Xenical , Alli , conjugate linoleic acid , Hoodia , Green tea extract , Guar gum , HydroxyCut , Sensa , Cortislim , Chromium , chitosan , Bitter orange ) Other Exclusion Criteria Recent history currently smoking , drink alcohol abuse drug ( prescription recreational ) Plans move study area within next 2 year plan study area 4 week next 12 month Planned termination pregnancy Unwillingness avoid pregnancy 12 month follow delivery Claustrophobia Prior plan ( within 1 year expect delivery ) bariatric surgery Participant 's unwillingness inability commit 1 year followup
